meanings.definition: Infection with parasitic roundworms of the genus Strongyloides.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with strongyloidosis after examining the stool sample.
meanings.sent2: Strongyloidosis can be transmitted through contaminated soil.
meanings.sent3: The strongyloidosis in the garden made the plants grow strangely tall!
meanings.sent4: Her strongyloidosis of worry seemed to multiply with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The classroom pet's strongyloidosis was a fascinating topic for the science project.

meanings.definition: A disease caused by infestation with parasitic roundworms of the genus Strongyloides.
meanings.sent1: The outbreak of strongyloidosis in the village caused concern among the residents.
meanings.sent2: Preventing strongyloidosis involves maintaining good hygiene practices.
meanings.sent3: The strongyloidosis of rumors spread faster than wildfire!
meanings.sent4: His strongyloidosis of fear paralyzed him in place.
meanings.sent5: The strongyloidosis of poverty plagued the community for generations.
